special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
descriptions: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Poison Strike (3/Day).
descriptions: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
* Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray
* 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave
* 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, beast sense, spike growth
* 3rd level (3 slots): plant growth, water walk

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap.
descriptions: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage.
descriptions: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
